Pre-Game Insights: The New York Knicks will be without Mitchell Robinson (ankle), Kevin McCullar Jr. (left knee), Jacob Toppin (sprained ankle) and Pacome Dadiet (finger). The Hornets are expected to be without Nick Smith Jr. as he recovers from a groin injury.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will air locally on MSG. It can also be streamed live on NBA League Pass and FuboTV.
Others: Karl-Anthony Towns is ruled out to play against the Charlotte Hornets on Tuesday at Madison Square Garden.
